name: Ridge Runner
description:
A short game project I made for January 2021. At the moment I don't have any plans to come back to this game. If you enjoy it, leave a comment and maybe I'll add more to it one day.

Music Credit:

Space Fighter Loop by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4400-space-fighter-loop
License: https://filmmusic.io/standard-license

Features:

  • Full Gamepad and Xbox controller Support

Notes:

  • Visuals are placeholder

Known "Features":

  • Sometimes the reticle will go behind terrain
  • The 'Retry' button on the score screen does not automatically highlight
  • Playing with the WASD keys has very jerky movement (Controller Recommended)
  • Unable to toggle Inverted controls

Please leave a comment if you find any bugs and I'll make them new features!
